verses.arabic: بِّسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ وَٱلتِّینِ وَٱلزَّیۡتُونِ
verses.translation: By the fig and the olive

verses.arabic: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنَ فِیۤ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِیمࣲ
verses.translation: We have certainly created man in the best of stature;
verses.transliteration: Laqad khalaqnal insaana fee ahsani taqweem

verses.translation: Then We return him to the lowest of the low,
verses.transliteration: Thumma ra dad naahu asfala saafileen

verses.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَیۡرُ مَمۡنُونࣲ
verses.translation: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted.
verses.transliteration: Ill-lal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati; falahum ajrun ghairu mamnoon

verses.translation: So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense?
verses.transliteration: Fama yu kaz zibuka b'adu bid deen

verses.translation: Is not Allah the most just of judges?
